product_name: The North Face Fair Acres Flannel Shirt - Women's
long_description: The North Face Fair Acres Flannel shirt for women is made from yarn-dyed, brushed cotton flannel for soft, wearable comfort any time. Sleeves roll up and secure at the elbows with button-tab closures. Button cuffs; 2 chest patch pockets.
short_description: The North Face Fair Acres Flannel shirt for women is made from yarn-dyed, brushed cotton flannel for soft, wearable comfort any time.
